roleset.name: put into a costume
roleset.note: COSTUME-V NOTES: I wonder if this would ever occur in the active? (from costume.01-v)

example.name: missing designer
example.text: *trace*-1 Inexplicably costumed *trace*-1 as a rabbinical student, tottering around on lifts, [Mr. Shicoff]-1 hardly seemed the fellow to catch a fancy cocotte's eye.
